title: Sonic Lost World
notes: Runs without any stability issues or errors, but at a lower framerate than Windows.  Playable.

title: Sonic Lost World
notes:
The game has a poor framerate and it struggles to go near 60 fps.
The game's speed is tied to it's framerate, so it will slow down a lot.
You can avoid slowdowns by adding --F or --F30 in the Launch Options in the game's properties. Some parts of the game will break because of --F and --F30, so be cautious.
like others it runs out of the box but has very low framerate. Semi playable.
title: Sonic Lost World

notes: After latest updates, game still runs extremely slowly and no tweaking seems to change that.
title: Sonic Lost World
